text: The agreement was signed in front of Chinese Prime MinisterLi Keqiang and Sri Lankan Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe by the Chinese Deputy Trade Minister Fu Ziying and Minister of Development Strategies and International Trade Malik Samarawickrama of Sri Lanka.An agreement was signed to grant 400 million Yuan to develop the economic and Technical cooperation between China and Sri Lanka at the Public auditorium yesterday (16thMay) in Beijing, China. The agreement was signed in front of Chinese Prime MinisterLi Keqiang and Sri Lankan Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe by the Chinese Deputy Trade Minister Fu Ziying and Minister of Development Strategies and International Trade Malik Samarawickrama of Sri Lanka.
title: Grant of 400 mln Yuan to develop economic and technical cooperation
